feed.title: Metabase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Metabase: Metabase v0.49.17
entry.content:
Upgrading

You can download a .jar of the release, or get the latest on Docker. Make sure to back up your Metabase database before you upgrade! Need help? Check out our upgrading instructions.

Docker image: metabase/metabase:v0.49.17 Download the JAR here: https://downloads.metabase.com/v0.49.17/metabase.jar

Notes

SHA-256 checksum for the v0.49.17 JAR:

5138378a2326147f146f42bde291c2b5d76a9d1ddebaf3d896744d6155ff7d50

Changelog

 **Bug fixes** - Ensure interactive embedding CTA matches instance features (#44197) - Bar graph failing (#44121) - Fields from Amazon Athena Tables / S3 Buckets Fail to sync if there is not an Underscore in the Table Name (#43980) - Multiply a negative number by 0.0001, and the display becomes as if multiplied by 0.00000001 (#40490) - Enum type columns don't show up for update actions in MySQL (#37638)

entry.title: New release for Metabase: Metabase v0.50.5
entry.content:
Upgrading

You can download a .jar of the release, or get the latest on Docker. Make sure to back up your Metabase database before you upgrade! Need help? Check out our upgrading instructions.

Docker image: metabase/metabase:v0.50.5 Download the JAR here: https://downloads.metabase.com/v0.50.5/metabase.jar

Notes

SHA-256 checksum for the v0.50.5 JAR:

51f44436b95deee73ae71b21f66321d82b8f12ca40577230b1d657378e000a73

Changelog

 **Bug fixes** - "scale: Timeseries" not working with Oracle database - "invalid time zone in DateTimeFormat(): +00:00" (#44128) - Don't sync JWT registered claims as login attributes (#43976) - Waterfall tool-tips do not correctly apply column value scaling (#44176) - Remove help@metabase.com from Error Diagnostic Modal (#44150) - Fix spaces in dashboard move toast (#44192)

entry.title: New release for Metabase: Metabase v0.50.6
entry.content:
Upgrading

You can download a .jar of the release, or get the latest on Docker. Make sure to back up your Metabase database before you upgrade! Need help? Check out our upgrading instructions.

Docker image: metabase/metabase:v0.50.6 Download the JAR here: https://downloads.metabase.com/v0.50.6/metabase.jar

Notes

SHA-256 checksum for the v0.50.6 JAR:

3d7ad42870426be7cf9bbecc11b6847222c31e9a8f28703563a980538edecf29

Changelog

 **Enhancements** - Disable SQL analysis by default (#44346) **Bug fixes** - If you don't have access to the root collection but inner collections, you get permission errors in QuestionPicker (#44316) - Goal lines displayed incorrectly when axis scale is not linear (#44278) - Field values remapping with mixed PK and a FK targeting the same PK is broken in public dashboards (#44231) - StreamingResponse cannot be cast to class clojure.lang.Associative (#44160) - Error while exporting a pivot table without columns in v50.x (#44159) - Bar chart per week not showing proper information on Timeline (#23336) **Under the hood** - Rework measure search performance events (#44300) - Remove frontend code that checks `enable-query-caching` (#44250)

entry.title: New release for Metabase: Metabase v0.49.18
entry.content:
Upgrading

You can download a .jar of the release, or get the latest on Docker. Make sure to back up your Metabase database before you upgrade! Need help? Check out our upgrading instructions.

Docker image: metabase/metabase:v0.49.18 Download the JAR here: https://downloads.metabase.com/v0.49.18/metabase.jar

Notes

SHA-256 checksum for the v0.49.18 JAR:

fda9ef4ddd4838e1512c56a96aca604283f80dc61210abc21954e04d3f790b97

Changelog

 **Bug fixes** - Can't sync JSONB columns with values in an array (#44459) - Database role is not respected when private key is used in Snowflake (#44351) - MB_JETTY_SKIP_SNI evaluating as string instead of bool, always evaluating to truthy if set (#42435) - On MongoDB, Distinct aggregation does not return a count because of lack of $size aggregation (#35425)

entry.title: New release for Metabase: Metabase v0.50.7
entry.content:
Upgrading

You can download a .jar of the release, or get the latest on Docker. Make sure to back up your Metabase database before you upgrade! Need help? Check out our upgrading instructions.

Docker image: metabase/metabase:v0.50.7 Download the JAR here: https://downloads.metabase.com/v0.50.7/metabase.jar

Notes

SHA-256 checksum for the v0.50.7 JAR:

68fbd7ac014932448022f878ee6957855297acc4c4e3ba6a06421881cb77db4c

Changelog

 **Enhancements** - **Dashboards** - Disable dashboard filters with native models in the UI (#44288, #39932) . _Note: this has always been the behavior of native models, but we're making it clearer in the UI._ - **Admin** - Add missing question mark in the 'Clear cache' confirmation modal (#44453) - **Performance** - Set `useLocalSessionState` and/or `alwaysSendSetIsolation` connection properties for MySQL/MariaDB (#44507) - Attempt to set `READ_COMMITTED` data warehouse transaction isolation before `REPEATABLE_READ` (#44501) - Make the App DB transaction isolation level READ_COMMITTED for MySQL (#44505) - **Other** - Disable "make exports look pivoted" (#44561) _Note: this is a temporary measure. We're planning to revisit this feature in the nearest future._ - Add Upload CSVs button for customers with feature flag (#42381) - Make popularity scores for "recent items" work with zero items and zero max execution count (#44692) **Bug fixes** - **Query builder** - Missing schema name in data picker (#44460) - Query changes are not accepted by the QB for some table questions if the query wasn't run before that (#44415) - Choosing the fields to Join On Resets Join Type in the GUI Editor (#42858) - Can't set binning on join columns to "Don't bin" (#42681) - Cannot filter on text primary/foreign keys in the question editor (#41824) - Adding a string to UI question's custom column crashes Metabase (#41381) - Result inconsistencies with Preview in GUI editor (#40399) - Join condition is not automatically selected (#39448) - Cannot edit a custom field named like the column it's referencing (#40064) - **Visualizations** - Chart dimensions are not updated when adding breakouts one-by-one (#44532) - Table loses visualization settings when using a click action (#43294) - **Dashboards** - Unable to connect dashboard number filter to number variable of SQL query card (#44266) - Field values remapping with mixed PK and a FK targeting the same PK is broken in public dashboards (#44231) - special characters on the data will break subscriptions (#43677) - **Admin** - In Admin/Performance/Database caching, 12:00PM cannot be used as a time in the Schedule component (#44257) - In Admin/Performance/Database caching, when a minimum query duration is saved for an adaptive policy, the new value does not appear in the form (#44249) - **Other** - Migrate down between 50 and 49 fails when you had sandboxing configured on 49 (#44455) - Making a model with a filter and aggregation will generate wrong x-rays (#44379) - Restoring a bookmarked entity (dashboard/question/metric) leads to application crash (#44224) - SQL "Unknown column" errors on 0.50.0 with breakouts on nested models (#43993) - MB_JETTY_SKIP_SNI always evaluates to true if set and false if unset (#42435) - Database mapped field in model metadata shows None after mapping/saving (#42355) **Under the hood** - bump echarts to v5.5.1-rc.1 (#44695) - perf: disable view log and card used updates during metadata fetches (#44502) - Track metabase.nqa module dependencies (#44464) - Fix string parsing error cluttering User Parameter logs (#44420) - Don't analyse non-SQL cards with Macaw (#44350) - [MBQL lib] Put `:fields :all` on joins on deleting last aggregation (#44321) - disable invalid move targets in the recents tab (needs recents API update: effective_location) (#42980)
